snippet: As Delhi prepares to hold legislative elections on Saturday, surveys suggest that the party of Prime Minister Narendra Modi will be eclipsed.
lead_paragraph: As Delhi prepares to hold legislative elections on Saturday, surveys suggest that the party of Prime Minister Narendra Modi will be eclipsed.

headline.main: Arvind Kejriwal Aims to Reclaim the Poor in Delhi Vote
headline.print_headline: Arvind Kejriwal Aims to Reclaim the Poor in Delhi Vote
